reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Support and operation of the prosthetic center.

description.narrative: 1. Rehabilitation of the prosthetic center in the city of Aden through the maintenance of the building and the provision of missing equipment. 2. Support local cadres through the provision of salaries and technical training. 3. Activate the production of quality prosthetic in Aden prosthetic center.

Rehabilitation of the prosthetic center in Aden governorate by providing basic equipment in the center as well as maintenance of the building to be ready for work as well as supporting the wounded and injured who suffered amputations by providing high and lower prostheses of high quality to help the beneficiaries to practice their lives normally. (Localization of the service) through the support, training and rehabilitation of young Yemeni cadres in the management of the project and provide them with the necessary training in the techniques of prosthetic industry to ensure the continuity of service after the end of the project.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
